channel.title: Hello, Please help :)
channel.description:
Allright, i had a source were the prices in the server was all screwed up ;P
Was wondering if anybody have a price file that is accurate and good, and want to share it with me?
Would love you to death lol, been trying to find a good one forever, but can't seem to work.
If you don't understand what i mean
Then i mean in the source, the prices of all the items in the game !
Thanks/Min0

item.title: Hello, Please help :)
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

This board is meant for asking for help with an issue you’ve encountered while programming your server, not requesting files. It seems you’ve already received some replies to help you out, but I’m afraid I’ll have to close this.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello, Please help :)
item.dc:creator: @Lanepker Lanepker
item.description:
@Lanepker wrote:

http://pastebin.com/dzisCXjE

You can use my Price list, but also you will have to edit some of the Item ID’s as some of them are custom items in my game I’m sure you have Item.cfg Enjoy my friend. Good luck to your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello, Please help :)
item.dc:creator: @JoeBenton2014 JoeBenton2014
item.description:
@JoeBenton2014 wrote:

Just search up the main items you would like to reprice.

You can get the item ids here: www.itemid.biz

Then in your folder: Source>Data>Prices.txt

Search the item id, For example, A whip for 10m:

4151 10000000 //Normal
4152 10000000 //Noted

^ ^
ID PRICE

Its simple, Once you get started, It wont take you that long.

Read full topic
